name: Learning Assistant
description:
[CS4241 Webware]
 Develop course outline and course website on github.
 Grade homework, project, and exams.
 Hold office hours to help students with the coursework.

name: Software Engineer Intern
description:
Designed and built a MapReduce pipeline that determines if Play Store apps are compatible with ChromeOS using Flume.
Migrated a data pipeline that writes device compatibility tags for apps. Migrated a data pipeline that backfills classifier decisions for newly submitted apps into the database.
Productionized the data pipelines using Borg.
Built a prototype LSTM model to classify malicious apps using text metadata with TFX.

name: Backend Engineering Intern (R&D)
description:
Created and whitelisted a backend service for previewing advertisements on mobile devices for the ad sales team.
 Implemented email alert and retries when ads encounter overbooking alert utilizing Failsafe and internal emailing tool.

name: Software Engineering Intern
description:
Design, support, and maintain development on web-based technology solutions using AngularJS.
 Implement automation tests using Selenium and Protractor. Work closely with a team in agile system development life cycle.
